definition: A unit of time that typically refers to a period of approximately 24 hours, beginning at midnight and ending at the following midnight. It is commonly used to describe a specific day or to indicate the passing of time within a day.

examples.english: I have the day off today.

examples.german: Es wird ein schöner Tag werden.
examples.english: It will be a beautiful day.

examples.german: Ich wünsche dir einen schönen Tag!
examples.english: I wish you a nice day!
